import docx

def func(doc_path, save_path):
    """
    Changes all words to uppercase and saves the document to the specified file path.

    Parameters:
    doc_path (str): Path to the input document.
    save_path (str): Path to where the modified document will be saved.

    Returns:
    None
    """

    # Read the input document
    doc = docx.Document(doc_path)

    # Replace all words with their uppercase equivalent
    for para in doc.paragraphs:
        for run in para.runs:
            run.text = run.text.upper()

    # Save the modified document
    doc.save(save_path)
